briefTitle: Silent Breast Cancer A Study of the Disease Prevalence Held by Imaging Guided Biopsies in Autopsy Specimens
officialTitle: Silent Breast Cancer A Study of the Disease Prevalence Held by Imaging Guided Biopsies in Autopsy Specimens
conditions: Female Breast Cancer, Male Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female and male cadavers above 40 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* Known breast cancer
* Breast tissue accidental damage
